choices.text: One day you and GTmac walk into a classroom and see a mysterious expression on the blackboard:\[ (1^b + 2^b + \cdots + a^b)~ \mathrm{mod}~ a \] Upon seeing the expression GTmac shows an evil smile and challenges you:  Let me give you the values of $a$ and $b$ and let s assume $b$ is an odd number. Want to bet who can evaluate this expression  The one who loses shall buy pizza for us tonight.
